page.title: 09THE TIME TUNNEL
page.content: The Domesday Commissioner swayed in his saddle, then fell heavily to the ground. When he rose to his feet his guards saw a look of absolute terror on his face. They looked towards the nearby church before making the sign of the cross. My God. What has happened? In the sky a big screaming bird. A three-eyed creature with each eye a different colour! The houses like palaces. This must be Hell! A giant monster coming for me, huge silver teeth. Its passed through me but its stinking breath chokes me. Another giant, red, carrying people it must have eaten. A wizard with pink spikey hair swaggers towards me, a plume of white smoke coming from his mouth and behind him a squat, red being frozen with its mouth open. This wizard is cruel. He has seen me, my God please forgive my sins!
